Description:
1. Randomly remove 2 of the Bound story assets below from the game
2. Put 1 Bound story asset at the Gallery of Darkness, Hall of Forgotten Faces, Path of Mankind, Chambers of Memory, and Stargazing Terrace.
3. Put Gigi Giuliano or Finlay O'Doyle beneath the Umbral Oubliette, Face Down.
Name: Notecard
